metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15692 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: TigerVNC version prior to 1.10.1 is vulnerable to heap buffer overflow.Vulnerability could be triggered from CopyRectDecoder due to incorrectvalue checks. Exploitation of this vulnerability could potentially resultinto remote code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable vianetwork connectivity.

criterions.comment: tigervnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
